MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL54 and LL55 postcode areas of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Waenfawr and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of complexity of the repairs required to a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.30PM on 27th November 2020.
